name: Centripede
description:
Centripede is a 2D Asteroid type game. The main mission of the players is to find the mothership in the space full of Centripedes. In space, players will face some space creatures called Centripedes that will attack players. Players can kill them by using a laser gun. Sometimes the Centripede is hard to kill, so the players need to charge the laser gun so that they deal more damage to them. Players will find some “clues” when roaming in the space. These things can help players to find the mothership and start the boss fight once they collect enough clues. The game aims to provide players with an interesting experience of exploring and fighting in space.

Controls:

Move:  WASD

Boost:  Space

Aim:  Mouse

Fire Laser:  Left Mouse Button

Charge Laser (Spin the ship 360 with right mouse down to charge):  Right Mouse Button

Credits:

Michael Anderson 

Jamie Carmichael
